articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mixed as U.S. inflation cools more than expected - CNBC
articles.description: Inflation readings for July came in at 3.2%, lower than the 3.3% expected, but higher than June's 3%
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets were mixed on Friday after inflation in the U.S. came in lower than expected, raising hopes markets could see a "soft landing" in the inflation fight.
